Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Mass spectrometry data showed a substantial reduction in the interaction of the TP53 protein with its binding partners in cells expressing the c.248G>A variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent experiments were performed, each with a different clonal cell line derived from the initial HEK293 cell line.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate for mass spectrometry.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was expressed as a positive control for TP53-binding partner interaction.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control demonstrating the absence of TP53-binding partner interaction.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Interaction scores greater than 2.0 for TP53-binding partners.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Interaction scores less than 0.5 for TP53-binding partners.
